> Anyone get a chance to try crawling this site with Heritrix.  I'm
> trying to figure out why it may cause heritrix to hang indefinately.

I couldn't reproduce this problem. What version of Heritrix do you run?
Are sure that you are not seeing
"java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out" exceptions in
local-errors.log?
Could you also post the order file that your are using or at least
Frontier configuration:
     delay-factor: 	? 	
     max-delay-ms: 	? 	
     min-delay-ms: 	? 	
     min-interval-ms: 	? 	
     max-retries: 	? 	
     retry-delay-seconds: 	? 	

and HTTP Fetcher configuration:
       timeout-seconds: 	? 	
       sotimeout-ms: 	? 	
       max-fetch-attempts: 	?

i.

> 
> --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "jirleech" <jirleech@w...> wrote:
> 
>>I have come across a site that seems to cause Heritrix to hang.  The
>>site actually doesn't seem to exist but it never times out.  The site
>>is http://www.suntrustpayrollcard.com .  I get no error or anything,
>>basically nothing happens and it doesn't quit.  Feel free to try it on
>>this site.  Many Thanks.
>>
